message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob. This offer is in your best interest, considering the inflation.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer is much fairer. Take it before inflation eats away at the value.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a good deal considering the money will be worth even less in the next round.
Alice, this is the best you'll get.  Accept it now, or we both lose out when inflation makes it worthless!
